testcase.name: Add new candidate in the Recruitment page
testcase.system-out: Given i login into the OrangeHRM site.......................................passed Then i enter the usrename and password......................................passed Then i click on the login button............................................passed Given user clicks on the Recruitment Leftpanel..............................passed Then user clicks on the plus Add button in the candidate tab................passed Then user fills up the candidate data.......................................passed Then user uploads the resume of the candidate...............................passed Then user enters the keyword and date of application........................passed Then user clicks on the save button to add new candidate....................passed
